overnightBuilds.title: Habit Streaks Dashboard
overnightBuilds.description: Unified habit tracker with streaks, heatmap, and daily check-ins.

overnightBuilds.title: Knowledge Graph Viewer
overnightBuilds.description: Dashboard to browse all entities in Nova's memory.

overnightBuilds.title: Meta Ads Knowledge Base
overnightBuilds.description: Searchable dashboard of Meta Ads expert strategies.

overnightBuilds.title: Copy Progress Dashboard
overnightBuilds.description: Visual tracker for Alessa descriptions project.

overnightBuilds.title: Macro Calculator
overnightBuilds.description: Quick food macro lookup for nutrition tracking.

overnightBuilds.title: Avia Quiz — Аз вече знам!
overnightBuilds.description: Educational quiz for Avia (5yo): 34 categories, 205 questions in Bulgarian, emoji answers, stars, confetti.

overnightBuilds.title: Nutrition Tracker 2.0
overnightBuilds.description: Full rebuild: food database with 25+ foods, micronutrient tracking, weekly trends, insights engine.

overnightBuilds.title: Буквички — Bulgarian Alphabet App
overnightBuilds.description: Interactive alphabet learning for Avia: 30 letters, emoji word associations, speech synthesis, practice quizzes, star progress.

overnightBuilds.title: Ad Copy Scorer
overnightBuilds.description: Score ads with Bencivenga's Persuasion Equation: 4 elements + CrackerJack (120 pts max), 12 proof elements checklist, Bridge Principle check, history tracking.

overnightBuilds.title: Lightning Lab
overnightBuilds.description: Node setup guide (8-step checklist), BTC thesis visualization (6 layers), Lightning ecosystem tracker (10 projects), concept glossary (10 terms), resource hub.

overnightBuilds.title: Idioms Practice
overnightBuilds.description: Flashcard practice with Leitner spaced repetition for 895 Makepeace expressions. 13 categories, session tracking, streak system, keyboard shortcuts.

overnightBuilds.title: Compound Growth Simulator
overnightBuilds.description: Interactive Monte Carlo simulator. 500 paths bootstrapped from V5.2 backtest data. Adjustable balance/risk/trades, scenario comparison, milestone projections, drawdown analysis.

overnightBuilds.title: V11c Band Selector
overnightBuilds.description: Visual comparison of all 6 V11c bands. Bar charts, efficiency frontier, per-pair breakdown, compound projections, and recommendation. Built to help pick the optimal band for live trading.

overnightBuilds.title: PF 2.0 Strategy Lab
overnightBuilds.description: Comprehensive V11c improvement dashboard: roadmap timeline, ATR comparison, pair×TF heatmap, year-by-year edge, dead-end analysis, key insights, compound projections, and path forward to PF 2.0.

overnightBuilds.title: Method Arena — Efficiency Frontier
overnightBuilds.description: Scatter chart of 99+ configs across 10 methods. PF vs Trade Count efficiency frontier, top 15 leaderboard, spread standalone results (#9), combo matrix, key insights, method status summary.

overnightBuilds.title: Multi-Pair Edge Comparison
overnightBuilds.description: BTC vs ETH vs SOL spacing champion backtest. 6 tabs: comparison table, PF vs spacing curves, year-by-year, TF heatmap, long vs short, auto-verdict. ETH PF 1.81, SOL 1.51, Combined 1.55 on 1,029 trades.

overnightBuilds.title: Sweet Spot Anatomy
overnightBuilds.description: Interactive deep-dive into WHY the sweet spot system (PF 4.34) works. 6 tabs: scatter plot (1,134 trades + 41 sweet spots), filter pipeline funnel, distributions, pattern anatomy diagram, winners vs losers comparison, sortable trade list. Key insight: winners and losers have nearly identical geometry — the edge is in setup quality, not execution.

overnightBuilds.title: Pivot Detection Lab
overnightBuilds.description: Dual-detector grid search visualization. 5 tabs: leaderboard (24 configs ranked), coarse×meso heatmap, per-trade bar comparison, 6-phase roadmap, AI Council recommendations. Aggregates 21 hier + 3 SM configs across 41 review trades.
